title:
Existence of Special Types Primitive Pairs in Finite Fields Avoiding
  Affine Hyperplanes
authors: Himangshu Hazarika, Giorgos Kapetanakis and Dhiren Kumar Basnet
abstract:
Let $\Fm$ be finite fields of order $q^m$, where $m\geq 2$ and $q$, a prime
power. Given $\F$-affine hyperplanes $A_1,\ldots, A_m$ of $\Fm$ in general
position, we study the existence of primitive element $\alpha$ of $\Fm$, such
that $f(\alpha)$ is also primitive, where $ax^2+bx+c\in \Fm[x]$ ($a\neq 0$ and
$b^2\neq 4ac$) in $\Fm$ and the primitive pair $(\alpha, f(\alpha))$ avoids
each $A_i$. We establish results for fields of higher order.
